sentences: Lollid on tavaliselt naljakad ja ebamugavad.
Need lollid inimesed ei saa midagi ära.
context: The word 'lollid' is the plural form of the Estonian adjective 'loll'. It means foolish, silly, or stupid. In Estonian, adjectives typically change their endings based on number (singular/plural) and case. The '-id' ending indicates this is a plural nominative form. The word describes people who act in an unwise or ridiculous manner.
